All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Event
This class stores all of the details of an event from the database
EventArrayAdapter
This class manages an ArrayList of Events into a ListView format
EventRepository
This class manages the statuses of participants and the accepting/declining of invitations.
FCMTokenManager
This class manages FCM tokens for access to Firestore.
Participant
This class defines a participant, tracking their status and timestamps for when they were last invited/updated.
ProfileArrayAdapter
This class manages an ArrayList of UserProfiles into a ListView format
UserProfile
This class stores the details of a user
ValidationUtil
Utility class for validating user input Provides validation methods for email, phone, names, etc.
